ygData.subject: RE: Effects of AGI
ygData.msgSnippet: i was only able to get imbrued legs and boots from PoF before it was patched (the hidious helm i got doesn t count hehe). other stats are from jewelry (plat
ygData.messageBody:
i was only able to get imbrued legs and boots from PoF before it was patched
(the hidious helm i got doesn't count hehe).
other stats are from jewelry (plat fire emerald rings, sapphire electrum
earrings, golden black pearl choker, plat star ruby veil) and armor (mithril
chest / arms / bracers, carnal pauldrons, elf-hide gloves, troll-hide belt).
i would use serpentine bracers but mithril match my chest/arms =)

looking forward to the new lambent armor quests found in the temple of
solusek ro. wonder if there will be stats on it other than just increased
AC like crafted.

Shada

> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> Wow, those are impressive! What stat enhancing items are you
> wearing to get
> those up that high? How much of it comes from PoF? :)
>

> Elwyn Heartstring
> Level 45 Bard
> Erollisi Marr
> (Almost high enough for PoF <grin>)

> 133dex
> 131agi
